input.sentences: there was a school assembly today | with prizes being handed out .
then the vice principal made her speech .
everyone was very interested in what they had to say .
at the the end of the day | quite a few people got awards .
output.sentences: Sarah was chosen most likely to succeed at the middle school graduation.
Followed by her homeroom teacher who supported her this year.
The principle then added some remarks.
As the parents sad, emotional that their middle schoolers were moving on.
Here is a shot of everyone who won a superlative.
